title: Cannot execute prysm for testnet
body:
Hello! I'am already running an instance of Prysm for my mainnet geth. Now I want to run prysm for goerli geth for testnet on the same server. Iam getting an error of could not listen to udp: bind address already in use. 

sudo ./prysm.sh beacon-chain --execution-endpoint=http://localhost:8552 --prater --jwt-secret=/home/ethereumnode/prysmtestnet/jwt.hex --genesis-state=genesis.ssz --suggested-fee-recipient=0x01234567722E6b0000012BFEBf6177F1D2e9758D9 --datadir=/home/ethereumnode/prysmtestnet/prysmtestnetdb

This is the command Iam using and below are the logs Iam getting


[2023-07-24 06:20:54]  WARN flags: Running on the Prater Testnet
[2023-07-24 06:20:54]  WARN node: 0x01234567722E6b0000012BFEBf6177F1D2e9758D9 is not a valid fee recipient address, setting suggested-fee-recipient failed
[2023-07-24 06:20:54]  INFO node: Checking DB database-path=/home/ethereumnode/prysmtestnet/prysmtestnetdb/beaconchaindata
[2023-07-24 06:20:54]  INFO db: Opening Bolt DB at /home/ethereumnode/prysmtestnet/prysmtestnetdb/beaconchaindata/beaconchain.db
[2023-07-24 06:20:55]  INFO node: Deposit contract: 0xff50ed3d0ec03ac01d4c79aad74928bff48a7b2b
[2023-07-24 06:20:55]  INFO p2p: Running node with peer id of 16Uiu2HAkwBf4MSNosd2A6rALnLuGPadMGkYDp9tzp3oZeC4fLz1y
[2023-07-24 06:20:55] ERROR rpc: Could not listen to port in Start() 127.0.0.1:4000 error=listen tcp 127.0.0.1:4000: bind: address already in use
[2023-07-24 06:20:55]  INFO rpc: gRPC server listening on port address=127.0.0.1:4000
[2023-07-24 06:20:55]  WARN rpc: You are using an insecure gRPC server. If you are running your beacon node and validator on the same machines, you can ignore this message. If you want to know how to enable secure connections, see: https://docs.prylabs.network/docs/prysm-usage/secure-grpc
[2023-07-24 06:20:55]  INFO node: Starting beacon node version=Prysm/v4.0.7/58df1f1ba5996d299c1c1d5874464884ee551be8. Built at: 2023-07-13 18:43:14+00:00
[2023-07-24 06:20:55]  INFO blockchain: Blockchain data already exists in DB, initializing...
[2023-07-24 06:20:55]  INFO initial-sync: Waiting for state to be initialized
[2023-07-24 06:20:55]  INFO gateway: Starting API middleware
[2023-07-24 06:20:55]  INFO gateway: Starting gRPC gateway address=127.0.0.1:3500
[2023-07-24 06:20:55] ERROR gateway: Failed to start gRPC gateway error=listen tcp 127.0.0.1:3500: bind: address already in use
[2023-07-24 06:20:55] ERROR powchain: Could not connect to execution endpoint error=could not verify execution chain ID as your connection is not authenticated. If connecting to your execution client via HTTP, you will need to set up JWT authentication. See our documentation here https://docs.prylabs.network/docs/execution-node/authentication: 401 Unauthorized: signature is invalid
[2023-07-24 06:20:55]  WARN prometheus: Port already in use; cannot start prometheus service address=127.0.0.1:8080
[2023-07-24 06:20:55]  INFO initial-sync: Received state initialized event
[2023-07-24 06:20:55]  INFO initial-sync: Starting initial chain sync...
[2023-07-24 06:20:55]  INFO initial-sync: Waiting for enough suitable peers before syncing required=3 suitable=0
[2023-07-24 06:20:55] FATAL p2p: Failed to start discovery error=could not create listener: could not listen to UDP: listen udp 0.0.0.0:12000: bind: address already in use
